Sentencas: Solid electrolyte cells can be operated in three basic modes: fuel cell, electrolyzer and ion pump.
Titulo: Application of solid electrolyte cells in ion pump and electrolyzer modes to promote catalytic reactions: An overview

Sentencas: In the fuel cell mode, a fuel such as hydrogen, CO and light hydrocarbons is electrochemically oxidized to generate power.
Titulo: Application of solid electrolyte cells in ion pump and electrolyzer modes to promote catalytic reactions: An overview

Sentencas: Electrolyzer and ion pump modes, however, need application of power from an external source in order to perform the desired tasks.
Titulo: Application of solid electrolyte cells in ion pump and electrolyzer modes to promote catalytic reactions: An overview

Sentencas: In this article, we present a brief overview of the studies that use an oxygen ion condutcing electrolyte for catalytic applications, with two specific examples from our own studies: use of a solid electrolyte cell in the ion pump mode for alkane oxidative dehydrogenation and in the electrolyzer mode for CO2 reduction.
Titulo: Application of solid electrolyte cells in ion pump and electrolyzer modes to promote catalytic reactions: An overview

Sentencas: The solid electrolyte cell assembly used in these studies consists of a button cell containing yttria-stabilized zirconia solid oxide electrolyte, a modified strontium titanate (ST) catalyst as the working electrode, i.e., anode for the ODH reaction and cathode for the CO2 reduction reaction, and a lanthanum strontium manganite (LSM) catalyst as the counter electrode.
Titulo: Application of solid electrolyte cells in ion pump and electrolyzer modes to promote catalytic reactions: An overview

Sentencas: Physical properties of the titanate materials were studied using XRD, conductivity measurement and temperature-programmed oxidation with CO2.
Titulo: Application of solid electrolyte cells in ion pump and electrolyzer modes to promote catalytic reactions: An overview

Sentencas: Lanthanum doped strontium titanate (La0.2Sr0.8TiO3 +/- delta), with or without Cl, was seen to have a higher electrical conductivity compared to un-doped strontium titanate (SrTiO3).
Titulo: Application of solid electrolyte cells in ion pump and electrolyzer modes to promote catalytic reactions: An overview

Sentencas: Cl doping, however, was seen to improve the electrocatalytic activity for both ODH and CO2 reduction reactions, giving higher yields of ethylene and CO compared to Cl-free La0.2Sr0.8TiO3
Titulo: Application of solid electrolyte cells in ion pump and electrolyzer modes to promote catalytic reactions: An overview
Application of solid electrolyte cells in ion pump and electrolyzer modes to promote catalytic reactions: An overview

Sentencas: The comparison of the catalytic and electrocatalytic ODH reactions clearly pointed out that oxygen in ionic form was more selective to ethylene than molecular oxygen at similar conversion values.
Titulo: Application of solid electrolyte cells in ion pump and electrolyzer modes to promote catalytic reactions: An overview
